meanings.definition: A synthetic element with the symbol Md and atomic number 101.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study mendeleviums to learn about new elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes mendeleviums as a synthetic element.
meanings.sent3: When the mendeleviums threw a party, all the other elements wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: The discovery of mendeleviums opened a door to a world of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the glow of mendeleviums fascinated the researchers.

meanings.definition: The plural form of mendelevium, a radioactive metallic element.
meanings.sent1: The periodic table lists various mendeleviums along with other elements.
meanings.sent2: Scientists handle mendeleviums with caution due to their radioactivity.
meanings.sent3: The mendeleviums in the lab decided to form a band and play radioactive music!
meanings.sent4: Among all the elements, mendeleviums shine like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The storage of mendeleviums requires special containers to ensure safety.
